notes: often means a pastry at cafes
example_sentence_english: I get a pastry at the cafe.
Fresh pastries are in the display.
I will bring some pastries tomorrow.

example_sentence_italian: Il colore della pasta è giallo.
example_sentence_english: The color of the pasta is yellow.
I add salt to the pasta.

example_sentence_italian: Sono allergico alle paste con noci.
example_sentence_english: I am allergic to pastries with nuts.
I smell fragrance from the pastries.
I put tuna in the pasta.
There is cream in the pastries.
I put the sauce on the pasta.

example_sentence_italian: Mettono zucchero a velo sulle paste.
example_sentence_english: They put powdered sugar on the pastries.
I cook with whole wheat pasta.

example_sentence_italian: Servo il tè con le paste.
example_sentence_english: I serve tea with the pastries.
